sqlMap.select: SELECT A.TG_ID tgId, B.CS_TICKET_ID cstId, A.IDENTITY_NUMBER identityNumber, C.USER_NAME userName, C.TAXPAYER_NUMBER nsrsbh, C.NSRMC nsrmc, C.THEME_CODE ztbm, D.ZTMC ztmc, A.CREATE_TIME createTime FROM T_TAXGUIDE_RECORD A LEFT JOIN T_TAXGUIDE_RECORD_INFO B ON A.CURRENT_TG_INFO_ID = B.TG_INFO_ID LEFT JOIN T_EFORM_RECORD C ON A.BUSSID = C.RECORD_ID LEFT JOIN T_THEME D ON C.THEME_CODE = D.ZTBM WHERE B.CS_TICKET_ID IN ( #foreach($cstId in $cstIds) #if($foreach.index > 0) , #end '$cstId' #end )
